original_text: Then Jesus answered and said unto her, O woman, great is thy faith: be it unto thee even as thou wilt. And her daughter was made whole from that very hour.
korean_text: 이에 예수께서 대답하여 이르시되 여자여 네 믿음이 크도다 네 소원대로 되리라 하시니 그 때로부터 그의 딸이 나으니라

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus answered and said unto her
O woman, great is thy faith
be it unto thee even as thou wilt
And her daughter was made whole
